variable.name: id
variable.description: Anonymized Participant ID

variable.name: status
variable.description: Case/Control Status

variable.name: bhsage
variable.description: Age at baseline BHS (Beck Hopelessness Scale)

variable.name: bhsgender
variable.description: Gender

variable.name: bhsdays
variable.description: Days since last BHS (Beck Hopelessness Scale)

variable.name: bhs1
variable.description: See future with hope and enthusiasm

variable.name: bhs2
variable.description: Give up because can't make things better for myself

variable.name: bhs3
variable.description: Helped by knowing bad things can't stay forever

variable.name: bhs4
variable.description: Can't imagine what my life would be like in 10 years

variable.name: bhs5
variable.description: Enough time to accomplish the things I want

variable.name: bhs6
variable.description: Expect to succeed in what concerns me most in the future

variable.name: bhs7
variable.description: My future seems dark to me

variable.name: bhs8
variable.description: Happen to be lucky and expect to get more than average person

variable.name: bhs9
variable.description: Just can't get the breaks and see no difference in the future

variable.name: bhs10
variable.description: Past experiences have prepared me for the future

variable.name: bhs11
variable.description: All ahead of me is unpleasantness rather than pleasantness

variable.name: bhs12
variable.description: Don't expect to get what I really want

variable.name: bhs13
variable.description: Looking ahead, expect to be happier

variable.name: bhs14
variable.description: Things don't work out the way I want them to

variable.name: bhs15
variable.description: Have great faith in the future

variable.name: bhs16
variable.description: Never get what I want so it's foolish to want anything

variable.name: bhs17
variable.description: Unlikely to get real satisfaction in the future

variable.name: bhs18
variable.description: Future seems vague and uncertain

variable.name: bhs19
variable.description: Look forward to more good times than bad times

variable.name: bhs20
variable.description: No use in trying to get anything, because I probably won't get it

variable.name: bhstotal
variable.description: BHS (Beck Hopelessness Scale) total scores
